title: How to Instruct an Unreceptive Child
itunes:author: Guest: Courtney DeFeo
itunes:summary: Patience is one of the hardest parenting traits to master. John and Danny offer advice to parents of strong-willed children. Receive the book In This House, We Will Giggle with your gift of any amount!
